raw_json.html_title: Barry3-Apdex Also Lives in R | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
Barry3-Apdex Also Lives in R

Posted on April 17, 2009 by Neil Gunther in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on Taking the Pith Out of Performance, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

As a by-product of my presentation on the Apdex Index at the NorCal CMG meeting, back in February, Guerrilla graduate, Stephen O’Connell, went off and did an implementation in R. You can read about it in this month’s CMG MeasureIT and download his R-script. Free access, but requires sign-up if you’re not already a member.

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: Taking the Pith Out of Performance.
R-bloggers.com offers daily e-mail updates about R news and tutorials about learning R and many other topics. Click here if you're looking to post or find an R/data-science job.
